content: measurements approximate age 4 6 8 10 12 pptt 88662211 to fit chest size cm 55 60 65 70 75 88 ppllyy finished chest cm 65 70 77 84 89 body length cm 40 44 48 52 56 bblloooomm sleeve length cm 23 28 33 38 40 bendigo woollen mills yarn requirements x 200g balls 8 ply bloom 2 2 3 3 3 yarn quantities can vary between crocheters and are therefore approximate requirements use only bendigo yarns as specified accessories a 4 00mm crochet hook or size hook to give correct gauge gauge 16tr and 9 row to 10cm over treble fabric using a 4 00mm hook it is essential to check your gauge before commencing this garment therefore work a gauge square if there are more stitches to 10cm use a larger hook if there are less stitches to 10cm use a smaller hook note this pattern uses australian/uk crochet terms abbreviations beg = beginning chain = chain cont = continue double_crochet = double_crochet decrease = decrease - *yarn over hook and draw up a loop in next st yarn over hook and draw through 2 loops repeat from * in next st yarn over hook and draw through all 3 loops on hook foll = following half_double_crochet = half treble increase = increasing lp = loop repeat = repeat sl = slip st/s = stitch/es treble_crochet = treble_crochet yoh = yarn over hook back next 0 0 2 2 2 sts decrease 1tr in last st 4 4 6 6 6 sts repeat last 2 row 0 1 1 3 3 times using a 4 00mm hook make 4ch sizes 8 10 and 12 only 34 35 36 33 34 sts foundation row miss 3ch counts as 1tr yoh insert 3rd row 1dc 1ch in first st decrease twice 1tr in last st decrease 1 st as before at each end of every row until hook under 2 strands of next chain draw lp through all sizes 4 sts 14 15 16 17 18 sts rem *** yoh and draw through 1 lp chain made yoh and draw next row 2ch miss first treble_crochet 1tr in next st decrease shape top edge of sleeve through 2 lps twice treble_crochet made *yoh insert hook next row 2ch miss first treble_crochet 1tr in next st next row 1dc 1ch in first treble_crochet decrease 1tr in each of under 2 strands of chain made draw lp through yoh fasten_off next 2 3 3 3 4 treble_crochet 1htr in each of next 3 3 4 4 and draw through 1 lp chain made yoh and draw note front is 2 row shorter than the back 4 treble_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of next 3 3 3 4 4 treble_crochet turn through 2 lps twice treble_crochet made repeat from * 50 54 58 with right side facing miss next 15 15 17 20 24 treble_crochet next row slip_stitch in each of next 3 3 3 4 4 sts 1ch 65 69 times
